name: Tropico Game Archive
summary: Learn about .HPK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HPK files for Tropico 3 & 4 can be extracted using HPK Archiver, a program created by a Tropico community member.

description: Game archive used by Tropico, a game where players build and maintain the island of Tropico as El Presidente, the ruler; may contain a variety of game data, including music (i.e., music.hpk), maps, and other content.
